metadata.title: CVE-2020-9895 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 13.6 and iPadOS 13.6, tvOS 13.4.8, watchOS 6.2.8,Safari 13.1.2, iTunes 12.10.8 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.3, iCloudfor Windows 7.20. A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpectedapplication termination or arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9895` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.28.4-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.28.4-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.28.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.4-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.28.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.4-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.28.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.4-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.4-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.28.4-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.28.4-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
